prompt: Cinematic wide shot: a cramped, over-lit family-restaurant table, too many bodies squeezed in. Center frame, Qualiatik and her beaming mother lean forward, asking about Tara. Reflections ripple across the tabletop like water; background windows show a parking lot on one side, a high-rise hotel lobby on the other. Warm tones, soft chaos, children’s laughter echoing.

Zoom out to reveal the restaurant itself is now a single suspended table on an inverted hotel stairway spiraling through storm-lit retail void, with the “HOTEL/RETURNS” sign flickering between both labels above double doors that open nowhere.

Morph one hanging dress into a half-formed doorway of midnight-blue silk; slip the glowing AETHERIA fabric shard into the viewer’s hand so the wall between racks begins to breathe open like storm clouds parting.

Add a quiet hotel room: two beds, return slip on dresser, dress hanging in closet, window showing calm evening and parked car; keep Qualiatik seated on bed, door ajar to the fading mall corridor beyond.
Fade room to dusk-lit exit: empty hangers, return slip signed "Accepted," and a faint chalk-arrow path visible through the window leading down to the glowing car on P3.
Add a calm highway-at-night view through the windshield—dashboard lit, Qualiatik silhouetted in passenger seat, city lights behind, empty road ahead merging into dusk.
